name: Gamma Tennis Extreme
description:
Play locally with up to HOW MANY AS YOU WANT! (provided you have enough controllers)

Hook up ANY controller to the game! I've played with my steering wheel (wouldn't recommend though)

Keyboard controls are there but are limited to 3 players. Here are the controls:

Q+WASD

U+IJKL

RightControl + arrow keys

This game is old, I made it back in 2013. Never fixed the bots cus my programming was too bad to fix, but I figured I could upload it anyway. I don't own the music, its from Kung Fury, music made by mitch murder. It was supposed to be placeholder music but I'll just release it as is.
